title: LeagueClient.exe - Bad Image *HELP*
body:
When i try and open league it tells me the following.

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libssl-1_1.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error"

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\libcurl.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error."

"C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\zlib.dll is either not designed to run on Windows or it contains an error."

I have tried doing a full reinstall with the Hextech repair tool and manually, which did nothing.

replies.body:
Dang ol' bad images. Typically this is easily fixed by deleting a specific file and opening League through a different one so let's give it a shot! Refer to the image below, but don't hesitate to hit me back up if this doesn't help.

https://i.gyazo.com/d339930159d84319872f8307a76ad117.png

I don't know, maybe your computer is too outdated, in which case look at a newer model or look for software updates, if not try contacting riot, this may be a bug with your computer, but I wouldn't know. Note: This is just what I do when league doesn't work for me. (Besides updating my computer model.)
